sn55.46:4.1: “Mendicants, a noble disciple who has four things is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.
sn55.46:5.2: It’s when a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the Buddha …
sn55.46:5.7: And they have the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones …
sn55.46:5.9: A noble disciple who has these four things is a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.”
